class_notes: Class is Friday 12-1:15pm *: A research-intensive lecture series where students will hear current issues, trends, and controversies in the field of Neuroscience and Behavioral Biology.  Class discussions are required and graded on Canvas.  Students search primary literature and bring related articles to the attention of others in the class.
course_description: These lectures expose neuroscience students to recent and cutting-edge topics and methods in neuroscience. Students interact with graduate students and speakers and engage in question and answer sessions. This course will not fulfill an NBB elective requirement.
sections: Class Nbr: 1354, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 12-1:15p, Instructor: K. Easterling, Status: Open
